experiment.name: CM2.1U_Control-1990_E1.M_3A
experiment.description: This experiment is same as the latest CM2.1U_Control-1860_D1 specified in /home/ccsp/fjz/ipcc_ar4_preK/CM2.1U_Control-1860_D1.xml, except for: 1. running with year 1990 radiative forcing and 1990 land cover 2. the executable is built with Khartoum code on sep 01, 2004 by this xml file: /home/fjz/cm2.1_K_20040901/CM2.1U_Control-1860_D1.xml 3. the initCond is based on /archive/fjz/IC/CM3_ic_00010101.cpio but reformed to one time level by Matt. 4. the diagTable has some addtions for energy balance terms suggested by Tony R. 5. run 30 atmos and 20 ocean PEs

component.name: ocean
component.paths: mom4/ocean_core mom4/ocean_diag mom4/ocean_tracers mom4/ocean_param/sources mom4/ocean_param/mixing/sigma mom4/ocean_param/mixing/neutral mom4/ocean_param/mixing/convect mom4/ocean_param/mixing/horz/tracer/lap mom4/ocean_param/mixing/horz/velocity/lap/general mom4/ocean_param/mixing/horz/velocity/bih/const mom4/ocean_param/mixing/vert/kpp mom4/ocean_param/mixing/vert/ocean_vert_mix.F90 mom4/ocean_param/mixing/polarfilter

source.csh: ( cd atmos_shared_am3 && git checkout $(RELEASE) ) ( cd atmos_param_am3 && git checkout $(RELEASE) )
( cd atmos_drivers && git checkout $(RELEASE) ) ( cd atmos_fv_dynamics && git checkout $(RELEASE) )
( cd ice_param && git checkout $(RELEASE) ) ( cd ice_sis && git checkout $(RELEASE) )

component.name: coupler
component.requires: fms ocean atmos_dyn atmos_phys land ice

input.fieldTable:
# specific humidity for moist runs
"TRACER", "atmos_mod", "sphum" "longname", "specific humidity" "units", "kg/kg" "profile_type", "fixed", "surface_value=3.e-6" /
# required by ESM
"TRACER", "land_mod", "sphum" "longname", "specific humidity" "units", "kg/kg" /
# prognotic cloud scheme tracers
"TRACER", "atmos_mod", "liq_wat" "longname", "cloud liquid specific humidity" "units", "kg/kg" / "TRACER", "atmos_mod", "ice_wat" "longname", "cloud ice water specific humidity" "units", "kg/kg" / "TRACER", "atmos_mod", "cld_amt" "longname", "cloud fraction" "units", "none" /
# test tracer for radon
# "TRACER", "atmos_mod", "radon" # "longname", "radon test tracer" # "units", "kg/kg" /
input.namelist: use_aerosol_timeseries = .false. aerosol_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, family_names = "small_dust", "large_dust", "sulfate", "aerosol" in_family1 = F,F,F,F,F,T,T,T,T,T,F,F,F,T,T,T,T,T,F,F,F, in_family2 = F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,T,T,T,F,F,F,F,F,T,T,T, in_family3 = T,T,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F, in_family4 = T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T,T, data_names = "so4_anthro", "so4_natural", "organic_carbon", "black_carbon", "sea_salt", "anthro_dust_0.1", "anthro_dust_0.2", "anthro_dust_0.4", "anthro_dust_0.8", "anthro_dust_1.0", "anthro_dust_2.0", "anthro_dust_4.0", "anthro_dust_8.0", "natural_dust_0.1", "natural_dust_0.2", "natural_dust_0.4", "natural_dust_0.8", "natural_dust_1.0", "natural_dust_2.0", "natural_dust_4.0", "natural_dust_8.0", filename = "aerosol.climatology.nc"

volcanic_dataset_entry = 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, using_volcanic_lw_files = .false., lw_ext_filename = " " lw_ext_root = " " lw_asy_filename = " " lw_asy_root = " " lw_ssa_filename = " " lw_ssa_root = " " using_volcanic_sw_files = .false., sw_ext_filename = " " sw_ext_root = " " sw_ssa_filename = " " sw_ssa_root = " " sw_asy_filename = " " sw_asy_root = " " do_lwaerosol = .true., do_swaerosol = .true., aerosol_data_set = 'shettle_fenn', optical_filename = "aerosol.optical.dat", aerosol_optical_names = "sulfate_30%", "sulfate_35%", "sulfate_40%", "sulfate_45%", "sulfate_50%", "sulfate_55%", "sulfate_60%", "sulfate_65%", "sulfate_70%", "sulfate_75%", "sulfate_80%", "sulfate_82%", "sulfate_84%", "sulfate_86%", "sulfate_88%", "sulfate_90%", "sulfate_91%", "sulfate_92%", "sulfate_93%", "sulfate_94%", "sulfate_95%", "sulfate_96%", "sulfate_97%", "sulfate_98%", "sulfate_99%", "sulfate_100%","organic_carbon","soot", "sea_salt", "dust_0.1", "dust_0.2", "dust_0.4", "dust_0.8", "dust_1.0", "dust_2.0", "dust_4.0", "dust_8.0"
cg_drag_freq = 1800, cg_drag_offset = 0, debug = .false., calculate_ked = .false., itest = 12, jtest = 42, ktest = 9, Bt_0 = 0.0015, lat_limit = 25.0

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 101,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'NOLEAP', dt_cpld = 7200, dt_atmos = 1800, atmos_npes = $atm_ranks, atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads do_concurrent_radiation=.false. radiation_nthreads = 1 ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks, concurrent = .true. use_lag_fluxes=.true.
trayfric = -40., nlev_rayfric = 1, do_mg_drag = .true., do_cg_drag = .false., do_topo_drag = .false., do_conserve_energy = .true.
linvers = .false., lcnvcld = .false., l_theqv = .true., lomega = .true., low_lev_cloud_index = 16, nofog = .false.

donner_deep_offset = 0 donner_deep_freq = 1800 save_donner_deep_diagnostics=.true. cell_liquid_size_type = 'bower' cell_ice_size_type = 'default' debug = .false. kttest=5 itest=53 jtest=32 ktest_model=17
n_print_levels = 14, use_qcmin = .true., num_pts_ij = 0, min_adj_time = 1.0, do_gaussian_cloud = .false., use_extrapolated_ql = .false.

convect_shutoff = .true., apply_entrain = .true., parcel_buoy = 0.25, parcel_option = 2, beta_rad = 0.5, Ashear = 25.0, radperturb = 0.10, critjump = 0.10, num_pts_ij = 0, i_entprt_gl = 112, 96, 89,105, 81, 97, j_entprt_gl = 71, 61, 56, 64, 53, 46
layout = $atm_layout nlon =144 mlat=90 nlev = 24 ncnst = 4 pnats = 0 n_split = 5 change_time = .true. consv_te = 0.7

interp_form = 'log' , do_calcstdco2tfs = .true., do_writestdco2tfs= .false., do_readstdco2tfs = .false., do_calcstdch4tfs = .true., do_writestdch4tfs= .false., do_readstdch4tfs = .false., do_calcstdn2otfs = .true., do_writestdn2otfs= .false., do_readstdn2otfs = .false.
cm2_bugs = .FALSE. ! post lima BUG fix nsteps_dyn=72 nsteps_adv=1 num_part = 6 wd_turn = 0.0 spec_ice=.false. ice_bulk_salin = 0.005 alb_sno = 0.80 t_range_melt = 10.0
do_lsc=.false., do_strat=.true., do_mca=.false., do_ras=.true., do_donner_deep = .false., do_diag_clouds = .false., do_cmt=.true., do_rh_clouds = .false., do_gust_cv = .false.

barotropic_pred_corr=.true. barotropic_leap_frog=.false. pred_corr_gamma=0.20 smooth_eta_t_fs_laplacian=.false. smooth_eta_t_fs_biharmonic=.false. smooth_eta_t_laplacian=.false. smooth_eta_t_biharmonic=.true. vel_micom_bih=0.01 vel_micom_lap=0.05 truncate_eta=.false. eta_max=8.0 verbose_truncate=.true. frac_crit_cell_height=0.20 zero_tendency=.false. debug_fs=.false. diag_freq=180

lap_friction_on=.true. k_smag_iso=2.0 k_smag_aniso=0.0 bottom_5point=.true. vel_micom_iso=0.10 eq_vel_micom_iso=0.0 eq_lat_micom=0.0 equatorial_zonal=.true. equatorial_zonal_lat=20.0 equatorial_no_smag=.true. viscosity_ncar=.true. ncar_only_equatorial=.true. vconst_1=8.0e6 vconst_2=0.0 vconst_3=0.80 vconst_4=0.5e-8 vconst_5=3 vconst_6=3e8 vconst_7=100.0 restrict_polar_visc=.true. restrict_polar_visc_lat=60.0 restrict_polar_visc_ratio=0.35

dt_ocean = 7200, time_tendency='twolevel' baroclinic_split = 1 surface_height_split = 1 barotropic_split = 80 acor=0.50 robert=0.05 aidif=1.0 energy_diag_freq=180 debug=.false. layout=$ocn_layout velocity_change_check=.false. velocity_change_max=20.0 velocity_change_max_num=100 velocity_change_diag_freq=180

neutral_physics_on=.true. neutral_physics_limit=.true. neutral_physics_debug=.false. aredi=600.0 agm=100.0 smax=0.002 swidth=0.002 tracer_mix_micom=.false. vel_micom = 0.0 gm_velocity_save=.false. agm_closure=.true. agm_closure_scaling=0.07 agm_closure_min=100. agm_closure_max=600. agm_closure_length_fixed=.false. agm_closure_length_rossby=.false. agm_closure_length_bczone=.false. agm_closure_baroclinic=.true. agm_closure_length=50.e3 agm_closure_buoy_freq=.004 agm_closure_upper_depth=100.0 agm_closure_lower_depth=2000.0 neutral_physics_simple=.false. neutral_linear_gm_taper=.true. neutral_sine_taper=.true. tmask_neutral_on=.true.
temp_restore_tscale = -10. salt_restore_tscale = -10. salt_restore_under_ice = .true. max_ice_thickness = 4.0 use_waterflux=.true. waterflux_tavg=.true.
reproduce_lima = .false. ! set to FALSE for faster algorithm shortwave_pen_on=.true. read_chl=.true. zmax_pen=100.0
sigma_diffuse_on=.true. tmask_sigma_on=.false. sigma_diffusivity = 1.e3 sigma_diffusivity_ratio=1.e-6 sigma_thickness_max=100.0 tracer_mix_micom=.true. vel_micom=0.50

convective_adjust_on=.true. t_min=-5.0 t_max = 55.0 s_min = -1.0 s_max = 55.0 t_min_limit =-2.0 t_max_limit =32.0 s_min_limit =0.0 s_max_limit =42.0 use_frazil=.true. zero_tendency=.false. debug_tracer=.false.
diffusion_kpp_on=.true. diff_cbt_iw = 1.34e-7 visc_cbu_iw = 1.0e-4 double_diffusion=.true. Ricr=0.3 smooth_blmc=.true. sigma_tide=3.0 p_tide=-0.25 tidal_mix=.true.

bryan_lewis_diffusivity=.true. use_diff_cbt_table=.false. linear_taper_diff_cbt_table=.true. bryan_lewis_lat_depend=.true. bryan_lewis_lat_transition=35.0 afkph_90=0.75 dfkph_90=0.95 sfkph_90=4.5e-5 zfkph_90=2500.0e2 afkph_00=0.65 dfkph_00=1.15 sfkph_00=4.5e-5 zfkph_00=2500.0e2
using_restart_file = .FALSE. rad_time_step= 10800, rad_package = 'sea_esf', do_clear_sky_pass=.true., renormalize_sw_fluxes=.true., zenith_spec = 'diurnally_varying'

verbose = 3 gas_printout_freq = 240
time_varying_co2 = .false., co2_variation_type = 'linear', co2_dataset_entry = 1990,1,1,0,0,0, co2_specification_type = 'time_series', co2_floor = 100.0E-06, co2_ceiling = 1600.0E-06, co2_data_source = 'input' calc_co2_tfs_on_first_step = .true., calc_co2_tfs_monthly = .false., co2_tf_time_displacement = 0.0,
time_varying_ch4 = .false., ch4_variation_type = 'linear' ch4_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, ch4_specification_type = 'time_series' ch4_data_source = 'input' calc_ch4_tfs_on_first_step = .true., calc_ch4_tfs_monthly = .false., ch4_tf_time_displacement = 0.0,
time_varying_n2o = .false., n2o_variation_type = 'linear' n2o_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, n2o_specification_type = 'time_series' n2o_data_source = 'input' calc_n2o_tfs_on_first_step = .true., calc_n2o_tfs_monthly = .false., n2o_tf_time_displacement = 0.0,
time_varying_f11 = .false., f11_variation_type = 'linear' f11_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, f11_specification_type = 'time_series' f11_data_source = 'input'
time_varying_f12 = .false., f12_variation_type = 'linear' f12_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, f12_specification_type = 'time_series' f12_data_source = 'input'
time_varying_f113 = .false., f113_variation_type = 'linear' f113_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, f113_specification_type = 'time_series' f113_data_source = 'input'
time_varying_f22 = .false., f22_variation_type = 'linear' f22_dataset_entry = 1990, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, f22_specification_type = 'time_series' f22_data_source = 'input'
do_thick = .false., do_nlte = .false., do_lwcldemiss = .true., continuum_form = 'ckd2.1', linecatalog_form = 'hitran_2000', verbose = 5

U00 = 0.800, U00_profile = .true., rthresh = 8.0, Dmin = 1.0e-07, n_land = 300.e6, diff_thresh = 0.1, mc_thresh = 0.001, eros_scale = 1.e-6, eros_choice = .true., eros_scale_c = 8.e-6, eros_scale_t = 5.e-5, super_choice = .true., tracer_advec = .true. do_old_snowmelt = .true.
use_tau = .false., gust_scheme = 'beljaars', do_mellor_yamada = .false., do_entrain = .true., do_edt = .false., do_diffusivity = .false., do_stable_bl = .true., do_shallow_conv = .false.

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 101,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'NOLEAP', dt_cpld = 7200, dt_atmos = 1800, atmos_npes = $atm_ranks, atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads, do_concurrent_radiation=.false. radiation_nthreads = 3 ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks, concurrent = .true. use_lag_fluxes=.true.

U00 = 0.800, U00_profile = .true., rthresh = 8.0, Dmin = 1.0e-07, n_land = 300.e6, diff_thresh = 0.1, mc_thresh = 0.001, eros_scale = 1.e-6, eros_choice = .true., eros_scale_c = 8.e-6, eros_scale_t = 5.e-5, super_choice = .true., tracer_advec = .true. do_old_snowmelt = .false.

component.name: ocean
component.paths: mom4/ocean_core mom4/ocean_diag mom4/ocean_tracers mom4/ocean_param/sources mom4/ocean_param/mixing/sigma mom4/ocean_param/mixing/neutral mom4/ocean_param/mixing/convect mom4/ocean_param/mixing/horz/tracer/lap mom4/ocean_param/mixing/horz/velocity/lap/general mom4/ocean_param/mixing/horz/velocity/bih/const mom4/ocean_param/mixing/vert/kpp mom4/ocean_param/mixing/vert/ocean_vert_mix.F90 mom4/ocean_param/mixing/polarfilter

source.csh: ( cd atmos_shared_am3 && git checkout $(RELEASE) ) ( cd atmos_param_am3 && git checkout $(RELEASE) )
( cd atmos_drivers && git checkout $(RELEASE) ) ( cd atmos_fv_dynamics && git checkout $(RELEASE) )
( cd ice_param && git checkout $(RELEASE) ) ( cd ice_sis && git checkout $(RELEASE) )

component.name: coupler
component.requires: fms ocean atmos_dyn atmos_phys land ice

input.namelist: months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 101,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'NOLEAP', dt_cpld = 7200, dt_atmos = 1800, atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads do_concurrent_radiation = .false. radiation_nthreads = 1 ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks concurrent = .true. use_lag_fluxes=.true.
